rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3868, 3891, M3002, M3003}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {PTY2031, PTY2042}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {PTY2031, PTY2042}
Must be enrolled in course version {3868, 3891, M3002, M3003}

description: PTY3051 continues to develop students' knowledge and skills in the five theme areas upon which the four year curriculum is based. These are: Theme 1: Personal and Professional Development; Theme 2: Population, Society and Health; Theme 3: Fundamental Knowledge of Health Science; Theme 4: Applied Practice; and Theme 5: Research.Case based learning remains the cornerstone for integration of the different themes within the course.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
